name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Earth Class
detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks the Earth class which is a medium to close range damage dealer with great survivability and a mix of class based utility spells. His passive spell gives him damage reduction in relation to his current mana which adds a level of toughness not seen in other classes.

Starting Spells:
Burst - Fling 5 small projectiles which each deal 6 - 8 damage and start in a cluster but then spread out over time.
Boulder - Throw a heavy physics projectile that has a short cooldown and does 30 - 32 AOE damage in a medium area.
Erupt - Summon a barrier of rocks which does 20 - 25 damage to any enemies hit and lasts for 7s. The caster must have their feet on the ground to use this spell.
Lodestone - Teleports player up into the air. Player becomes invulnerable after teleport, and can aim beneath themselves. After 3 seconds the player crashes back to the ground at their aimed location and deals 30 - 50 AoE damage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only), Windows Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM3-compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
